heading: Sunday Night
text: Cloudy. Rain, mixing or changing to snow over the higher hills and the mountains. Chance for freezing rain to stick in the Champlain Valley and northern hills. Lows in the 30s, nearing 40 in the southern valleys. Light and variable wind.

heading: Monday
text: Rain showers, mixing with snow or wintry mix in the northern mountains, then becoming more scattered later in the day. Highs in the 30s increasing to the 40s and 50s in the southern valleys.

heading: Monday Night
text: Widespread scattered rain showers turning over to snow after sunset. Lows mainly in the 20s, nearing 30 in the Champlain Valley. Wind becoming west at 5 to 10 mph.
